topic.title: Clinical Assessment Boolean Value - conformance rules

section.p: Contains the value for a clinical observation that can be expressed as a boolean.

ol.li: Contains exactly one [1..1] value with data type Boolean
Contains zero or one [0..1] bodySite with data type Code
Contains exactly one [1..1] clinicalObservationDate with data type Point In Time
Contains zero or one [0..1] clinicalObservationType with data type Code
Contains exactly one [1..1] id with data type Id
Contains exactly one [1..1] isPresent with data type Boolean
Contains zero or one [0..1] observationMethod with data type Code
Contains exactly one [1..1] severity with data type Code
Contains exactly one [1..1] status with data type Code
Contains exactly one [1..1] value with data type Boolean

Contains zero or one [0..1] device, where its type is Device
A contrivance or an invention serving a particular purpose, especially a machine used to perform one or more relatively simple tasks." (The American Heritage Stedman's Medical Dictionary)

Contains zero or one [0..1] patientState, where its type is Patient State Observation
The state of the patient being observed.

Contains exactly one [1..1] practitioner, where its type is Individual Provider
The practioner who is observing the care for the patient .
